item.title: 如何进行调试以及性能剖析
item.description: “The most effective debugging tool is still careful thought, coupled with judiciously placed print statements” — Brian Kernighan, Unix for Beginners. 最朴素的debug方法还是使用print，并且在合适的地方插入print
